verses.verse: Then he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, the way toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>: and he brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me into the chamber <S%H3957><s%> that was over against the separate place <S%H1508><s%>, and which was before the building <S%H1146><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>.

Before <S%H6440><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> of an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the north <S%H6828><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

Over against the twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits which were for the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, and over against the pavement <S%H7531><s%> which was for the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, was gallery <S%H862><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> gallery <S%H862><s%> in three <S%H7992><s%> stories.

And before <S%H6440><s%> the chambers <S%H3957><s%> was a walk <S%H4109><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> breadth <S%H7341><s%> inward <S%H6442><s%>, a way <S%H1870><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%>; and their doors <S%H6607><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>.

Now the upper <S%H5945><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> were shorter <S%H7114><s%> <S%H8803><s%>: for the galleries <S%H862><s%> were higher <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> than these <S%H2007><s%>, than the lower <S%H8481><s%>, and than the middlemost <S%H8484><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%>.

For they were in three <S%H8027><s%> <S%H8794><s%> stories, but had not pillars <S%H5982><s%> as the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the courts <S%H2691><s%>: therefore the building was straitened <S%H680><s%> <S%H8738><s%> more than the lowest <S%H8481><s%> and the middlemost <S%H8484><s%> from the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And the wall <S%H1447><s%> that was without <S%H2351><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the chambers <S%H3957><s%>, toward <S%H1870><s%> the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> on the forepart <S%H6440><s%> of the chambers <S%H3957><s%>, the length <S%H753><s%> thereof was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

For the length <S%H753><s%> of the chambers <S%H3957><s%> that were in the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: and, lo, before <S%H6440><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And from under these chambers <S%H3957><s%> was the entry <S%H3996><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> on the east side <S%H6921><s%>, as one goeth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into them <S%H2007><s%> from the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>.

The chambers <S%H3957><s%> were in the thickness <S%H7341><s%> of the wall <S%H1444><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>, over against <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%>, and over against <S%H6440><s%> the building <S%H1146><s%>.

And the way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them was like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the chambers <S%H3957><s%> which were toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>, as long as <S%H753><s%> they, and as broad as <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7341><s%> they: and all their goings out <S%H4161><s%> were both according to their fashions <S%H4941><s%>, and according to their doors <S%H6607><s%>.

And according to the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the chambers <S%H3957><s%> that were toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> was a door <S%H6607><s%> in the head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%>, even the way <S%H1870><s%> directly <S%H1903><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wall <S%H1448><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>, as one entereth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into them.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he unto me, The north <S%H6828><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> and the south <S%H1864><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%>, which are before <S%H6440><s%> the separate place <S%H1508><s%>, they be holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%>, where the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> that approach <S%H7138><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>: there shall they lay <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, and the meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>; for the place <S%H4725><s%> is holy <S%H6918><s%>.

When the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> therein, then shall they not go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place into the utter <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, but there they shall lay <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their garments <S%H899><s%> wherein they minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; for they are holy <S%H6944><s%>; and shall put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on other <S%H312><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and shall approach <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to those things which are for the people <S%H5971><s%>.

Now when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of measuring <S%H4060><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, he brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> whose prospect <S%H6440><s%> is toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>, and measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it round about <S%H5439><s%>.

He measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H7307><s%> with the measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H520><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> reeds <S%H7070><s%>, with the measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

He measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H7307><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> reeds <S%H7070><s%>, with the measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
He measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> side <S%H7307><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> reeds <S%H7070><s%>, with the measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>.

He turned about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H7307><s%>, and measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> reeds <S%H7070><s%> with the measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>.

He measured <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it by the four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7307><s%>: it had a wall <S%H2346><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> reeds long <S%H753><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, to make a separation <S%H914><s%> <S%H8687><s%> between the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the profane place <S%H2455><s%>.
